creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: oval basket with open weave around most of body in diamond pattern; horizontal bands of closed weave around top and bottom; diagonal weaving around mouth; handle made of four thin reeds coupled together and crossed at top
signed: on bottom in white: 玩々斎造 {Gangansai zō} (created by Gangansai)
title: Basket
